events.message: I just received my order, but the item is broken. There are large scratches on the surface and it doesn’t work properly.
The reported issue has been identified as a product defect due to the customer's description of broken parts and scratches.
An agent from the product support team has been assigned to handle the customer's defective product complaint.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the damage to your product. I’m here to help get this resolved as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged product and confirm if you would like a replacement or a refund?
I’ve attached photos showing the scratches and broken parts clearly. I would prefer a replacement because I really need the product.
Thank you for the photos. We will send out a replacement at no extra cost immediately, and arrange a pickup for the damaged item.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response. I appreciate your help in resolving this matter swiftly.
Your replacement product has been shipped and the pickup for the damaged item is scheduled. The issue is now resolved.
Just checking in to ensure the replacement product arrived in good condition and meets your expectations.
We are closing this case now as the replacement was successfully delivered and you have not reported any further issues.
Thank you for contacting support. Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your experience with our service.
